devdoc.author: rashtrakoff <rashtrakoff@pm.me>.
devdoc.details: Some variables necessary/common for all cores are stored here. These variables are referred in the cores.

params._DHPTx: Supertoken of the corresponding DHPT of `_dHedgePool`.
params._dHedgePool: Address of the dHEDGE pool for which a core needs to be created.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDAOAddress(address).details: Sets DAO address for all cores.

setDefaultFeeRate(uint32).details: Sets fee rate for all cores.

params._defaultFeeRate: The new fee rate scaled to 1e6.

setImplementation(address,string).details: Sets a new implementation of core contract.Only to be used in case of an issue with existing/default implementation. Must be removed after testing.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CONFIG_WORD.custom:note: CONFIG_WORD is used to omit the specific agreement hooks of superapps (NOOP - Not Operate).

devdoc.title: dHedge core factory.

cores(address).notice: Mapping containing core address for every dHEDGE pool if deployed/created.

createdHedgeCore(address,address).notice: Creates a new core for a given dHEDGE pool.

defaultFeeRate().notice: Fee rate for collecting streaming fees scaled to 1e6.

userdoc.notice: Contract to create new cores easily.
